absyn

Class IfThenElse

  • java.lang.Object
    • absyn.Absyn
      • absyn.Command
        • absyn.IfThenElse

  • public class IfThenElse
extends Command
    A node of abstract syntax representing a conditional command.
    Author:
    Fausto Spoto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IfThenElse(int pos, Expression condition, Command then)
      Constructs the abstract syntax of a conditional command without the else branch.
      IfThenElse(int pos, Expression condition, Command then, Command _else)
      Constructs the abstract syntax of a conditional command.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkForDeadcode()
      Checks that this conditional does not contain dead-code, that is, commands which can never be executed.
      Expression getCondition()
      Yields the condition or guard of the conditional.
      Command getElse()
      Yields the else branch of the conditional.
      Command getThen()
      Yields the then branch of the conditional.
      Block translate(CodeSignature where, Block continuation)
      Translates this command into intermediate Kitten bytecode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IfThenElse

        public IfThenElse(int pos,
                  Expression condition,
                  Command then,
                  Command _else)
        Constructs the abstract syntax of a conditional command.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the source file where it starts the concrete syntax represented by this abstract syntax
        condition - the guard or condition of the conditional
        then - the then branch of the conditional
        _else - the else branch of the conditional

      • IfThenElse

        public IfThenElse(int pos,
                  Expression condition,
                  Command then)
        Constructs the abstract syntax of a conditional command without the else branch.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the source file where it starts the concrete syntax represented by this abstract syntax
        condition - the guard or condition of the conditional
        then - the then branch of the conditional

        Yields the else branch of the conditional.

      • checkForDeadcode

        public boolean checkForDeadcode()
        Checks that this conditional does not contain dead-code, that is, commands which can never be executed.
        Specified by:
        checkForDeadcode in class Command
        Returns:
        true if and only if every execution path in both branches of the conditional ends with a return command

      • translate

        public Block translate(CodeSignature where,
                       Block continuation)
        Translates this command into intermediate Kitten bytecode. Namely, it returns a code which evaluates the [@link #condition} of the conditional and then continues with the code for the compilation of then or _else. It then continues with continuation.
        Specified by:
        translate in class Command
        Parameters:
        where - the method or constructor where this expression occurs
        continuation - the continuation to be executed after this command
        Returns:
        the code executing this command and then the continuation
